content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back pourch smoking when i looked up and notice a ball of light. at first i thought it was a satellite, but when the ball got brighter i notice a halo like around the ball. i ran in grabed my camera and started filming.
 at first i could not see the ball, then it liked appeared out of nowhere.I only got about 20 secs. of the ball on video before it disappeared on me. after i stopped my camera,the ball reappeared over my apartment. i tried to film again,but the sun was kinda in the way.
 the ball at first did not move, it just hovered in one spot,but the halo around the ball looked like fan blades i could see it change from a light gray to kinda black. i could hear no sound. the ball was moving south east, more to the east.
i could feel a tingle like sensation going through my body at the time i was filming. the sensation lasted till i walked back indoors, then it was more of a excited feeling that came over me
 
 second sighting

   07/17/2010 @ approximate 2:30 pm 

i was at the park with my son (the park is located in beaverton oregon next to southridge high school.) when i caught this bright ball out of the corrner of my eye. when i looked up, it looked like the same ball of light i had seen the other day.
what makes this one diffrent was i notice three jet planes flying around this ball. the planes circled around the ball for a few minutes then they took off. the ball was moving real slow towards the south east, moving more eastward.
the ball continued to move real slow,some trees got in my way of view, so when i moved to get a better look i had lost sight of it.
i did not bring my camera with me. now i wished i did.
with this sighting i felt nothing as to feelings, just a few people walking by asking me what was i looking at, when i told them they just laughed and walked on.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was on my back porch smoking when i looked up and noticed a ball of light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a comet type object 2 times within 2 weeks.  the first time i saw it i was putting on my jacket to go out in front of my living room window in my apartment that is upstaires.  i saw about 500 yards away a comet like object traveling southward for about 7 seconds.  it turned westward and up into space disappearing.  then 3 seconds later a very beautiful round object appeared in the same area.  it looked like a very precious shiny stone, as it hovered for about 7 seconds then very quickly disappeared in the area where the comet object did.

two weeks later i was walking home from the library approaching a field where railroad tracks used to be nearby where i live.  i looked up, and saw that comet object only about 200 yards away.  it was traveling westward at about 15 mph for about 7 seconds.  it filled a quarter of the sky.  it turned out into space with its vaperous tail completely following it.

this object looked exactly like a comet.  it was pure white with a perfectly rounded head, and vaperous tail.  

i do not know why the object was not broadcasted on television or at least on the radio.

i saw this object many times before after the above.  the info is basically the same, so there is no sense in disclosing those sightings.

thank you.

*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: A comet like object i saw 2 times within 2 weeks.

content.detailedDescription:
This is the last time i am sending you my 26 photos of unusual lights i and others in my area witnessed every night since 1986.  in around 1994 mufon of orange county and me did a 2 day investigation of these lights.  mufon told me they are airplanes or they are coming from disneyland.  disneyland is 10 miles away, and the lights we witnessed coming in at 2 at a time every 30 seconds were about only 300 to 500 feet away.  two years later jan harzan who was a mufon investigator told me that the lights in that investigation went into mufon's records as "unknown".  then he continued saying, "meaning ufo".

some of the lights in my photos show them either entering or exiting another dimension.  you can this, as the lights look half or partial.  almost all my photos show lights that can be mistaken for lamp lights, however it you compare photos you can see that the lights must have been moving by other nearby lights or by background.  i never changed my location while photographing the lights.  also what came out on film was nothing like what i saw in most cases.  the photo of the small white light up near a building is too small to be the moon.  before i photographed it it looked like a small dot, and not a light at all.  the smoke picture is a complete mystery to me being that i never remember filming it or anything like it.  i am sure you agree it is not from any natural source.  and the 2 objects under the street light were the first 2 objects i photographed.  they appeared one after the other.  peter davenport from the ufo reporting center told me i sent him street lights, as though he did not see the objects under the street lights.  i believe the white lights might be ufo related besides the white light on top of the shoe city building.  i do not know what the orange/red lights are.

between 2003 to 2005 i filmed these same type objects.  i used a samsung camcorder with a 880x digital zoom, so i was able to get right up to the objects.  i did not use a tripod, because the objects often would vanish before i could get a fix on them.  however i filmed upclose objects that resembled jupiter; with an eye on its surface that looked around robotically then disappearing into the object; objects that partially disolve then go back the way it was; objects that show black carbon type clouds that quickly run over its surface; small white lighted objects that form perfect triangles and rectangles then slowly move on.  i accumulated 8-hours of footage, and recently after editing i have 1 hour of my best footage.  it was produced as a dvd by o.C. media.  and it is not bad for not using a tripod.  if you would like a free copy of it please let me know.

i got the impression that you are very discreet about contacting people with evidence.  if you do not want to contact me then it's okay, but may i ask you to let me know if you were able to successfully open my upload of my photos? again this is the last time i will send them to you.

thank you.

*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms.
content.summary: I became aware of unusual lights in my area every night since 1986.

content.detailedDescription:
17 july 2010

93-94 im not sure which im pretty sure 93, december before christmas me my girlfreind and her mom went to get xmas tree, on the way back about a mile back on her property on a dirt rd. we were on "the top of the world" so called, the highest elevation behind day ave. 7900-8000 block away from the main highway, geographic information should get you to that big hill, there was a oil pump on the hill. it was dusk, i saw out the corner of my eye a streak of light from one side of the sky to the next and stop at a dead stop. and then to another side of the sky and stop, i told her to stop and we all got out, more than one object repeated this in no random order, and no particular pattern, i would say approximately 40-50 of these fairly bright lights that resembles something the size of a lg. remote control aircraft, i'd say a 1000-2000 ft or maybe more in the sky. we sat and watched this light show for it seemed like an hour, it was almost dark and they thinned out, we were excited about it, knowing it had to be something unmanned, or not from this world, we headed back to the house 7976 day ave. navarre oh, the site of a 1800 log cabin and old barn, over to the right of the mobile that used to be there me facing the mobile, i heard a low pulsating hum, very powerful like a whum whum whum whum, kinda sounded like someone with 20 15" subs really loud in the distance, i saw outta the corner of my eye while bringing the tree in the mobile a incandecsent light, i looked up and over the trees couple hundred ft. up or so a very large object hummed along very slowly.Looking at it i noticed a colorful fog in a reccess in the underside, the colors remind me of oil in water, but looked like a gas, in combustion of some type, swirling in this contained reccess, i didnt notice any standard aviation markings as i know is mandetory like blinking lights or any thing of that sort, i watched it for a second and ran inside, called hopkins airport and asked if there long range radar could pick up something that far away, they said its probably a blimp, the only two operational blimps in cleveland are fuji, and goodyear blimps. they gave me the numbers to the hanger, i called i believe if my memory serves me right and agian the date and time are approximate, goodyear said there blimp was in the hangar, fuji said they where over cleveland, i might have these reversed but none the less cleveland is 50+ miles away, and they where doing arial veiws of a football game over the old stadium. they said to take a picture, but when i went out it was gone.
we never said a word agian about it until i was reminded of the experience, i didnt want people to think i was nuts and there wasnt anything on the news so i wrote it off. 16-17 years later, im deciding to report this. i gave the whole experience thought, i believe the little objects were scouting the area to make sure it was safe for the mother ship/ secondly potentially jamming any radar from picking it up, i dont know why our land??? my x's 70 year old mom still lives on the premise and remembers everything,which i just found out, my 14 yr old son i never saw because of break up lives there now, i just reunited with him on the phone yesterday. my x also remembers that night. 

*(wit's name and other info deleted--sgonzalez/cms.
content.summary: Small objects, large object.

content.detailedDescription:
at approximately 3p.M. out of my southeast facing office window i observed a copper colored brightly flashing object larger than a planet and slightly elongated moving into the top of a line of pine trees. it was much brighter than anything i have ever seen in the day light which is what drew my attention. the object moved laterally to my left behind the tree tops, emerged on the other side, and began a slow vertical ascent. i pointed this out to several co workers. my boss also took note of this as a very unusual looking object. he hurried outside to get a closer look, and i followed shortly. when i arrived in front of the building in addition to my boss, were two other co workers who were out smoking at the time. all four of us were now oberving the strange object in braod day light. it was not like anything any of us have ever seen. in the time it took me to go downstairs and outside, it had risen higher into the sky and was now almost directly over head. in a completely cloudless crystal blue background there was no reference for the altitude or size of the object. smaller pieces appeared to be breaking away and falling rapidly. this effect was noticed at least three different times. after approximately ten or fifteen minutes of maintaining a relatively stationery position, it appeared to begin falling. you could almost see a tumbling type effect and it began to get substantially larger. at this point i made a run for my phone with the intention of getting a picture. i told another friend of mine in the office about it on the way to my desk. he headed outside while i found my phone. by the time i came back the object had fallen below the tree line although the fifth witness did observe the object before it went out of sight. my boss actually jumped in his car and took off in attempt to locate the point of impact. it is tough to estimate how near or far this may have been without the ability to get a feel for the altitude. there is also no way of knowing if the object was purely reflecting light, or giving off it's own. it was remarkably bright in the light of day, and at no point did it ever go completely dim the way an airplane does when its angle in relation to the sun changes. it also lacked a consistent shape. as earlier stated, it first appeared oblong, and seemed to change. i believe we were probably seeing it from different angles. i have not seen any local news coverage so far, and was hoping you have encountered similar reports. i would love an explanation of what this may have been!!


joseph d schaefer
content.summary: i saw a very bright object out of my office window. myself and four co workers ran outside and oserved for fifteen minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on 90w at around 5pm between the hilliard and clague rd. exits. the sky was perfectly clear except for some clouds very low on the horizon. i saw out of the corner of my eye what i first assumed was a helicopter hovering in place. i looked up and noticed immediately that i was mistaken, as this craft had no wings, blades, or anything. it was simply a smooth, metallic silver pill-shaped object. i only got to look at it for a couple of seconds before (i assume) the car in front of me noticed it, too, and hit their brakes suddenly. i looked away for only a second to gain control of my car and looked back less than two seconds later to see that the object had disappeared without a trace.
content.summary: Pill-shaped ufo over 90w (cleveland, oh).

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work a little bit early just sitting outside waiting for everyone else. out of the corner of my eye i saw this red-ish colored small ball like shape blinking. at first you could just see it hovering between the trees and blinking. then i noticed that it was moving away from where it was hovering at but very incredibly slowly. almost as if it would go and then stop briefly before moving on. it continued to do this until it was either no longer in my sight or just gone. 

this object was flying way to low and way to slow for it to have been any type of a plane.
content.summary: Blinking light hovering and moving over halifax.

content.detailedDescription:
Family was exiting resturant on main street in parsons kansas at approximately 21:30 hours local when 5yo ask "whats that and pointed up to eastern sky.

conditions were dusk, several thunderstorms in area to northeast and to south but only upper level clouds in our area. during previous flights that day we had light cloud layer from 10000ft and up with alot of haze.
three of us witnessed a bright firball,orange/yellow in color and modulating intensity traveling from south to north on what appeared a level or nearly level course.

if it were an aircraft on fire i would estimate above fl10 and 200 or less knots, located close to kansas/missouri border. we lost sight because of buildings.

possibly a meteor that was much higher and way further east in the upper strata then either one of us though but didn't look like it.
content.summary: Fireball, traveling south to north, above fl10.

content.detailedDescription:
I am hesitant to explain the full sighting , hoping to corroborate the account.
but... as if it were a huge light showe projection - hanging in the air and refracting slightly through the clouds.  a clockwork. 11 pointed (hash marked) "clockface" which blinked, point to point (counterclockwise) then would radiate outward as if each point were a laser-like light shooting outward to all ends of the entire sky.  then would radiate down again and again from the same , distant central point in the sky. it lasted over one hald hour as i walked home and took position on an upper floor of a house on a steep hill so it appeared from that angle to hover and could be seen from a slight sideways view- producing a slight oval instead of its perfect circular clock face. over and over again flashing its rays outward after having "dialed" its counterclockwise blinking pattern.  bright light- almost blinding but darkkening also into bright greens and blues then when it flashed it was briefly red and orange on the edges of the rays.
later it hopvered off, and finally did get smaller as it hovered away into the distance- still shooting forth rays in all 360��� from the circular clockface.
i am intentionall leaving out one or two details- seeking uncontrovertible coroboration from some other source.
i am trying to contact satalite engineers to see if it was some kind of skanner from above, but based on the improbability that such a skanner could penetrate clouds and seem to be suspended in the thin and thick air- and to be so, so bright.
it was 3 (am) but i am still astonished that no other reports came from this long, intesively lighted sighting could be found in any news account.  this region is rural but , as most of germany, densely populated .
it was july 26, 2009- 
nothing, absolutely nothing about this sighting seemed rigged or man-made in any way.
my feelings? ok- yes i was a bit tired from a long work night, but sober and clear headed.  i was awe-struck and could not later sleep a wink.
i was not afraid but i had the odd perception of focused, alert, well-being.
i was at the time certain that someone else had seen it.
content.summary: Clockwork (counterwise) 11 pt."face" periodically radiating outwardly- enormous and looked projected from far , far above from a single point of bright light.

content.detailedDescription:
Summary: this case involves two sightings of the same/similar object in a 24-hour period. first sighting occurred at 0230hrs 19 jun by two minor teenaged females. they were in the pool, heard a loud ���engine��� noise���looked up and saw a circular object about 9-10��� in diameter with three lights on the bottom in equilateral positioning. the lights glowed from red to yellow and there was a green aura or haze around the outside. it was estimated at approximately 100��� agl headed 360 degrees at about 50mph. they were frightened and quickly climbed out of the pool and ran into the house so hastily that one of them slipped and fell and scraped her knee. the parents were asleep, so they did an internet search and located contact information for mufon. the next morning, they told one of the witness' mother. at 2330hrs that night, they saw the same object at a much higher flight level (1500��� agl) headed 240 degrees. they ran inside, alerted the one's mother; and she came outside in time to see it disappearing over the trees south-west of their position. the mother's description was very similar although she admits she only saw it briefly and much further away. geographic survey of the area includes mild rolling hills, farm land, woods, pasture; affording low levels of ground light pollution after dark.

no electromagnetic anomalies were experienced in the residence, although the witness claims that their power goes out frequently due to their rural setting. no physical trace evidence was found, and no claim of injuries or physiological affect was reported. radiation readings in the front yard were .08 micro-sieverts. back yard was slightly higher reading .12-.14 msi, but that was taken over their landscaped brook (near the tree line)  and is not significant. general photos of the location were taken to show relation of house, swimming pool and tree line.
content.summary: Circular object seen twice in 24-hour period by total of three witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
At 1h00 am, a golden star appeared at the eastern horizon.
vertically the star slowly climp up in the sky for approximatly 1 hour.

after, the golden star perfectly diagonally climb up in the sky until approximatly 5h00 am, then disapeared.

very nice and sweet light. very enjoyable.
content.summary: Eastern golden star.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the porch having a cigarette and star gazing as i always do. there was a bright round light that was floating at an even altitude for quite some distance, then rapidly climbed upward and looked like it slowly burned out, the loss of light was like what you would see if it was a meteor but traveling up not down and at a much slower pace. i had a guest that i asked to step outside and take a look, neither of us could see anything that would identify this object as typical aircraft, such as blinking lights, and we both watched as it climbed and disappeared.
content.summary: Bright light floating at even altitude then rapidly climbed and slowly faded out.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were in our apartment swimming pool gazing up at the stars at 2:55am. we were pointing out the various stars like we commonly do when we're outside. my husband had reported a sighting approximately a month ago of lights in a y shape behaving in a weird manner. i never got to see those but.. as we were looking at the stars, i looked to the sw and so far distant in the sky, i saw what appeared to be 2 white moderately bright stars flying side by side in an upward motion towards a 1 o'clock position if you were to compare to a clock. they went up at a medium speed but too fast to be an airplane. the two stars were quite distanced from each other so i don't believe it could have been lights on the wings of a plane. they moved somewhat erratically but flew towards the 1 o'clock position slowly up and exactly side by side. i was frightened when i saw it. it was like nothing i had ever seen before. i am not one to quickly believe this stuff, and it freaked me out after having heard my husbands story. it seemed odd and ironic to me that it could be happening again, just this time i'm having the opportunity to see it. i called out to my husband and said "what the hell is that!" he couldn't see it at first as i pointed, not removing my eyes from the white starlike lights. they were moving, travelling and i couldn't believe my eyes and i was trying to figure out what they could be and my husband finally spotted them. i must have looked away at my husband to see if he saw them because when i looked back, i could see them slowly fade out and they were gone. my husband says that he did see the two lights/stars except by the time he saw them he said they were moving down together side by side. i have no idea what these lights are but, it's the first time i've ever seen anything like this and i am totally freaked out and somewhat frightened. i went outside just a while ago to see if i saw anything else and there's nothing but pretty stars. i just can't explain those lights. it wasn't a plane, they weren't stars because stars do not move together side by side in an upward fashion moving kind of erratically, or jiggly as i will call it. it just makes no sense.
content.summary: 2 white lights that looked like stars flying in upward motion side by side

content.detailedDescription: I was just outside playing with my dog and looking at the stars when a small light moving in the sky caught my attention. at first i thought it was a satellite because it was moving the same speed as one and the same shape and size also, but then i saw it wasn't one because i saw a smaller red light travelling behind it. it was moving around 2x as faster than the first object which was infront of the red light, it lasted about 6 seconds as i was watching the red light coming more closer to the white object. then, the red object looked like it was ''sucked'' into the white light. after that the white object was moving for a few more seconds than faded out and vanished.
content.summary: White light sucks in red light which was moving behind it.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were stargazing in my back yard when we noticed something moving fast, far out there.  it was so far out it was dim, and a bit hard to see.  we watched it disappear behind clouds, and reappear on the other side.  eventually, it got too far away and disappeared as fast as it had come.  

it wasn't too spectacular to look at.  the object was too far away to see it's actual shape.  it just appeared as a dot, about the size of a star.  

we weren't sure what it was.  there had been a couple of shooting stars out there.  we figured it wasn't one of them because the object seemed to be changing direction, and adjusting itself as it flew.  

immediately after it disappeared my first thought was to report it to mufon.
content.summary: Was stargazing and saw a light jut fast across the sky.  weaved in and out of the clouds before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were relaxing on the porch,in chairs on either side of our front door, facing north. i noticed what i thought were lightning bugs in the near sky. i was amazed at how fast they were blinking as they seemed to disappear behind a large tree, or disappear as these insects do. the upper light was above,away, and ahead of the lower. both blinking as if talking... almost synchronized but very fast. i then noticed them blinking in breaks in the tree, and still the same estimated distance apart. 
i told my wife to watch as they started to clear the other side of the tree (they were moving from west to east). i asked her to explain to me what she was seeing, and her story was exactly what i was seeing. i watched as they seemed to turn north as they approached the next tree that would block my line of sight. they either slowed and disappeared, or turned north and sped off.
content.summary: Two ufo's, one above, away, and ahead of the lower. both blinking as if talking. upper red, lower pale blue.

content.detailedDescription: I was setting on my front porch when i happen to look off to my right towards my neighbors house and this object orangeish red light what appeared to be a glowing god knows what it was but so strange it was coming towards my way west and stopped in mid air and sat in one spot for a couple of minutes and looked to me like it was pulsating and real bright to dim then it went back the way it was coming away from me and i watched as it got off in the distance that i couldn't see it anymore if anyone seen this object please feel free to email me *(wit's email deleted--sgonzalez/cms)  i have not a clue what it was and i know it wasn't no plain nor helicopter this is what i saw right up close me and my mother please fallow the link (youtube link moved to addtl evidence-- sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Orangish red glowing object of some source.

content.detailedDescription: As a took my wired haired fox terrier cosmos across the road in front of my house i turned in the direction of the southern sky and saw a orangish-red object moving in the distant southern sky just above the treeline in a southeastardly direction.  this object was a fourth the size as the one seen on july 4th 2010 because it was at a much farther distance. no visible blinking lights as seen through 10x30x50 zoom bushnell binaculars. my wife and i were stargazing just prior to my taking our dog for a short walk.  if i had continued to stargaze lying on a patio lounge chair i would have missed seeing this object because it was so low and distant in the southern sky.  this is only the second orangish-red moving object i have seen in years of watching the night sky.  time of sighting was exactally 10:50 pm. same as on july 4th. coincidental???
content.summary: Southern sky, moving south easterly orangish red object in the distant south just above the tree-line, no blinking lights visible, visible for 45 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
At around midnight on july 15, 2010, my 14 year old daughter and her 14 year old friend were sitting in the hot tub in our backyard.  they were talking and looking at the sky and both witnessed this object at about the same time. 

the night was clear with a quarter moon and the stars were very bright.  this object flew over them from southeast moving northwest.  they only watched it for about 10-15 seconds and became scared and came into the house.  

what they saw and described to me was a boomerang shaped object oriented with the point forward and the two tails toward the back.  it had a series of 7-8 illuminated brownish orange orbs along each tail. she could see stars between the two tails so it was apparently open space. my daughter felt that the orbs were not quite perfectly aligned. the object made no sound and it flew in a straight line.  the size was difficult to estimate at night. she felt that the speed was about what you would expect of a low flying jet aircraft.  she felt the altitude was far less than what a commercial jet would fly (30,000 to 40,000 ft) and maybe something closer to what a high flying bird or small aircraft would fly, maybe 500-2000 ft.  

both of the girls were frightened because this was unlike anything they had seen before.  they came into the house and woke my wife. by the time she went outside it was out of sight.  

we are about 75 miles from mountain home afb but rarely see any of their aircraft.  we have sparse commercial air traffic but know what the high flying passenger jets look and sound like.  we considered that it might be a flock of geese, ducks or pelicans but just didn't seem plausible because we are a long way from any river or lake and don't see them during the day not to mention that they wouldn't appear illuminated.
content.summary: Illuminated boomerang object in southern idaho.

content.detailedDescription:
We were walking our dog down the street. it was about 8:56 p.M. as we were walking, something grabbed our attention in the sky. we saw a gray ufo shaped disc with 3 lights, flickering. the ufo object moved from left to right in a straight position. then it hovered down and disappeared.

when we saw the object, we knew it wasn't an airplane. an airplane can't be a disc shaped object. we felt scared when we first saw it. we stood still to see where it might go. after that we didn't see it.
content.summary: The ufo had 3 lights. flickering white lights. it hovered in a straight position and then it glided down.

content.detailedDescription:
I was talking with a supplier in china and mentioned the huizhou sighting and he told me it was not the most recent and added this along with the link to the chinese web information:

huizhou is in guangdong province of china.It is far away from me.But i have heard some ufo news that is in xiaoshan airport of zhejiang province.It is near me.Please see this: [links moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg].  it is amazing.Do you believe it is ufo?Haha!
 
eric

he also confirmed the airport rerouting in a second conversation with:

i think so.It is strange.I think the 51 zone is ture!!!Haha!!This event has bought a lot of flight are be land on backup airport.So it is real.But these ufo is not be found by radar.And that,these pictures are so clear,it is very rare!
content.summary: Chinese email conversation of recent huizhou sighting.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening noted above i had been on my back deck looking at the planets through my telescope with two of my neighbors . after seeing venus and saturn my neighbors returned home. at approximately 10:15 i witnessed a bright light coming out of the nw. it was moving at a slow rate of speed, something like a small single engine plane. the thing that was odd was the light on the craft was very bright white and there were no red or green navagation lights or any flashing lights at all. i went inside the house and got my wife and daughter to come see it. i also got a small pair of binoculars to see if i could more easily identify the craft. i could not make out any defining shape or markings.  the white light was too bright. we watched as the craft moved across the sky and finally out of site behind a house down the street. the craft never changed speed or direction that we could tell and it had no sound at all, it was a very quite evening. many small planes fly over our neighborhood and we know the sounds they make. my daughter and i discussed what we had seen and agreed that we had seen the same thing on the night of june 25 while walking at night through the neighborhood. on that evening we told our neighbors about what we had seen and they said they had seen something similar to our discription of the object a week earlier.
content.summary: Bright light traveling at slow rate of speed crossing the sky from nw to se

content.detailedDescription: I was watering plants at the end of a long hot day and venus has been out so vividly, i assumed it was venus until it started to move. i watched it as it was real bright and no sound and low, about 500'. i was to tired to relly react much other than to verbally tell it to come down and help us(people). i stood up when it came over head and i just watched it until it turned and changed to a reddish/orange color.I knew it was real low as a turb-prop plane flew over-head.I first saw it in the w.N.W. and it traveled in a s.S.E. direction,then it turned and went s.It flew over me,and my house.I live in the mountains and you can see everything at night.Thats it. this is my official 2nd ,barred none sighting in my life the 1st was when i was about 22-23 yoa.Back then i had one come real,real close and it messed me up in the head for quite awhile,this one didn't bug me at all, i guess age has a part in that fact.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright venus colored light,in fact i thought it was venus as i was working and it started moving from the n. to the s.E. and it came over head and turned and changed color as it turned and slowing moved away.

content.detailedDescription:
it was in my backyard, i spotted an extremely large bird. i ran inside and back out with the camcorder to get video of the bird, but i was too slow. the bird was just out of sight as i returned. (this thing was giant, but thats another story.) 
 my commotion brought my girlfriend out to the yard, she was trying to help me spot the bird when she noticed a weird "something" flying. at 1st glance i thought to myself "just a helicopter", less than 2 seconds later i knew i was wrong, but could not figure out what it is. after looking at the video i still can not figure out what it could be.
 it flew very slow, i heard nothing coming from it at all, it seemed to be moving along at a constant rate. it was very windy out, the bird i spotted was "kiting", i do not believe this object could be a balloon floating along at all, it is not a plane or a helicopter.
 once i realized i had no idea what i was looking at i became shaky, nervous.
in my mind i thought my god its like videos on the internet.I think i was in shock, perhaps just getting over it.
 
  i did my best to video tape it, i had great difficulty seeing it in the viewfinder of my camcorder, so i was often catching it as it got out of view, but there are a (very) few very good closer frames in the video. i apologize for the poor quality of the video overall. i stayed outside until my camera battery died, then came inside uploaded it (from sony handycam, using sony picture package software to video capture it from the camcorder to the pc), then reported it here to mufon. you can see my last sighting of the object in the video, it flew over the hill behind our house and the roof of our house blocked it from sight.
 the only thing ive done to this video itself is as follows.
recorded it using sony handycam digitial 8
uploaded video from camcorder via video capture to pc using sony picture package software that came with the camcorder.
recompressed the video using virtualdub and divx fast motion codec.
content.summary: Unknown object going across sky.

content.detailedDescription: i was up on the 5th floor of westchester medical center looking out the window toward 75north. all of a sudden i looked up and saw a huge fireball, my first reaction was maybe it was a small comet burning up. my second reaction was we were about to be bombed, then it seperated into three pieces, the middle piece remained larger than the two pieces on either ide.  they all maintained equal distance  from either as they spread apart. then they dissapeared and as fast as they went two came back and then two more appeared to form a diamond, then a fifth appeared on the bottom right. the two on the left and right dissapeared and appeared lower, then bottom left light moved diagonolly toward upper right. i tried to get my video camera on my droid to work but it wouldn't penetrate the window. i ran down five flights of stairs out the back door and as i turned the corner two were left litterally zipping back and forth  and then they were gone as fast as they appeared. this went on for atleast ten minutes.
content.summary: One big fire ball.

content.detailedDescription: He says to look for the dark teardrop shape near the sun... but what about those four lights in a straight line that are between the sun and the large red spot in the photo. zoom in on those 4 lights and you will see what i am referring to. that looks more like a ufo to me than the teardrop which could be a bug on the lense. check out the 4 lights that form a line. also you listed as 2010 but the google photo is stamped 2008. just wanted to make a note of that for you. i assume 9am by position of sun in sky.
content.summary: Reply to: 2010-07-16 check google maps for mona st, oxbow, sk - look near the sun - teardrop shaped ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
While i was unpacking and putting away my things from my other next door apartment complex i took a break in my living room.  as soon as i sat down i looked out my upstaires living room window and saw a pendulum shaped object come out of the sky very quickly and stop about 400 feet from me.  

it was very beautiful possessing all the colors of the rainbow.  it looked like a ball with a stick coming from it on the top.  the ball quickly spun in one direction, and the stick in the opposite direction.  it acted like a pendulum with very fast motions.  i saw it for 3 seconds when it flung out and in one very fast motion disappeared into space.  

the ball of the object was 3 feet in diameter, and the stick was about 7 feet long.


i saw ufos every night in my area since 1986.  i photographed them, and filmed them. the upload below shows 26 of the objects i photographed.  a lot of it looks like lamp lights, but if you compare the lights with background and with each other you can clearly see they are not all lamp lights.  one photo looks like smoke.  maybe it is, but i do not remember taking it, and how can its shape be from a natural cause? sorry, but the photos are old, and a little corrupted.  however it is all i have to offer you.
content.summary: While moving in my new apartment i saw a beautiful object come out of the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back deck turning off my pool and was looking at the sky cause it was supposed to rain.. im not gonna try and guess how far away but not very far at all in the sky i saw an all silver shiny either cigar or disc shape ufo fly straight into a cloud and disapear..It made no noise and was close enough that if it was a small plane or helicopter i should have been able to see the blades or hear it..It moved very slow..It could not have been a jet cause there was no jet trail or whatever its called....Whole thing lasted about a min or so until it went into clouds it started to pour down rain and thunderstorm soon as it went into clouds
content.summary: Ufo or something flew into clouds and not even 2 seconds later thunderstorms.

content.detailedDescription: It was too hot so we (husband, son, mother-in-law & neighbor)sat outside on lawn chairs just talking trying to cool off.  my son was getting frustraded from the heat so i said to him to look up at the stars with me (trying to get him to change his focus) but he wasn't interested and went off to ride his scooter.  my husband and i just sat there with our head tilted back looking up and i said (light-hearted), "what if those arn't stars and are ufo's watching us?" no one commented, we all just sat star gazing.  it was about maybe 7-8 min. since my comment when my husband said excitedly, "look at that one! it's speeding across the other 2 passing them up!!!"(meaning stars) we all stood and looked up and could clearly see this one bright "star" go across the sky passing 2 other stars until making a complete stop.  my son asked what it was and we told him it was a falling star so not to scare him and asked him to go inside to check on his sleeping sister.  once my son was not around we all started talking about what we had seen.  it was definately not a falling star...It did not dissipate.  it went from one spot to another without loosing it's brightness.  it definately got our attention so now we were all staring up into the sky wondering if those really were stars we were watching so now my light-hearted question seemed more intense.  i don't know how much time went on from one sighting to the next (we remained outside for maybe 20 mins. or so) but i can say that we did see a total of 3 "stars" at different times and areas of the night sky and each one zoom from one point to another, across the sky!  we also noticed there were 3 brighter stars very far apart from eachother but formed a triangle if you were to connect the dots. i couldn't tell what the distance was only that they looked as if they were as far up as stars are.  we would have loved to remain outside but our parenting duties called us in!  by the way, this is the second sighting i've had i just never reported the 1st one which was in north whittier, ca in 2006.  this would have to be a whole other report!
content.summary: We were star gazing when we realized they weren't stars!

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the field directly accross from [address removed/cms/tg], next to route 34.  i was walking home from [name deleted cms/tg] house adjacent to the field.  while walking toward the house i noticed it got very bright and there was a super bright yellow/white light over our house.  it was more oblong than disk but not very high (maybe as tall as the single story home).  there is no definite shape. i can still see it in my mind. i stopped and just stared at it for an unknown period of time.  i think i stood there for a few seconds but i believe it was much longer.  i remember running into the house to get a camera and when i came out it was gone.

in 1977 while in art class we had an assignment to draw a portrait.  i drew a face with thin cheeks and larger eyes with a ridge of some type going down from the forehead to where the bridge of a nose would be.  there was no nose.  when [name removed/cms/tg] (art teacher) saw it he took it and said no very loud and he was angry.  mr. [name removed/cms/tg] also lived a few blocks from me on mable street.

all my life this has bothered me and of course, i don't really tell anyone because i don't want them to think i'm nuts but i saw something and it wasn't normal; it was not the sun; it was not a plane.  i don't know what it was.  when i first saw the object i was a little frightened or maybe surprised and then later excited as i went for the camera and finally disappointed when it was gone.  i felt sad it was gone.  sad as if my best friend moved or something.

as an adult, looking back, i feel i lost time but i have no other memory of the event.  i've looked on the internet to see if anyone else saw this but i have not been successful.
content.summary: Bright yellow/white disk/oval over house, hovering.
